name: htb-manual-domain-help
args: 2. Look for Location headers and redirects in verbose output
3. Extract domain manually from redirect URLs
4. Add discovered domain to hosts file
5. Run FFUF: ipcrawler run htb/htb-ffuf-subdomain-domain discovered.htb
Note: FFUF subdomain scans FAIL with IPs - need domain first
description: HTB help guide for manual domain extraction workflow without system paths
author: HTB Team
